!Katenar: Ah... If only time permitted, I would like to tell you everything... But it does not, unfortunately, and even now time is growing short. Are you familiar with the word *"Spicula?"* Go ask one of my brethren, *Harkilgamed* about it and listen to his reply... I can speak no more -- I must disappear now. Remember: *Spicula Kamael* You will find Harkilgamed hiding in the *Valley of Saints*. [Quest _236_SeedsOfChaos 32333_02.htm|"Wait!"]
